user_query: My friend is planning a hiking trip to the Grand Canyon. Can you provide the air quality forecast for the next three days in that area? Also, recommend some hiking trails nearby. Additionally, provide a simple radiation forecast for the same period.

TaskList.description: Fetch the air quality forecast for the Grand Canyon for the next three days.
Recommend hiking trails nearby the Grand Canyon.
Fetch the radiation forecast for the Grand Canyon for the next three days.
